context_of_use: This use case allows customers to complete purchases by selecting payment and delivery options and finalizing orders.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to choose the most convenient payment option
description: This use case enables customers to finalize their purchases by selecting payment and delivery options.
preconditions: Customer has items in the cart.
Customer is logged into the system.
postconditions: Customer receives confirmation of the order.
assumptions: Customer has a valid payment method available.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to checkout using multiple payment methods.
main_flow: 1. Customer initiates checkout → System displays checkout options.
2. Customer selects payment method → System processes payment.
3. Customer selects delivery options → System confirms delivery details.
4. Customer finalizes order → System places the order and sends confirmation.
